string-array.name: titleExercise
string-array.item: One From Two
Four From Nine
One From Five

string-array.name: textAboutOne
string-array.item: When logic is powerless..\n\n
The desire to distinguish between two types of knowledge (intuitive and logical) - emerged already in antiquity.\n\n
In today\'s world have proven that you can train your intuition and not very difficult!\n\n
How could still hear the voice of your intuition?\n\n
First of all, a firm belief in themselves and their forces - the basis for the successful training of intuition.\n\n
On the field of nine buttons, computer hides five emoticons.\n
Task to open four buttons with smiles.\n\n
A bit of theory:\n
Before the open button on the screen - listen to the inner voice (it can be visual or auditory association).\n\n
Further, IT IS IMPORTANT - try to remember this feeling, or association, and then open the button.\n\n
Compare with the results (true or not).\n\n
The main goal during training - to hear and discern answers your intuition.\n\n
Exercising daily to ten minutes and started with the likely result of about 50%,
each week will increase the efficiency of approximately 5..10%\n
Training intuition - is perseverance, practice and belief in yourself!\n\n
Yes, you will arrive with Power of Intuition!
